title: 808 26 "A Heartbreaking Duel! Luffy vs Sanji! - Part 2"Transliteration: "Kanashiki Kettō – Rufi VS Sanji" (Japanese:哀しき決闘　ルフィVSサンジ) Takashi Ōtsuka Shōji Yonemura October 1, 2017(2017-10-01)[n 5]
transformers_text: 808 26 A Heartbreaking Duel Luffy vs Sanji Part 2 Transliteration Kana shiki Kett Ru fi VS Sanji Japanese VS Takashi tsuka Sh ji Yone mura October 1 2017 2017 10 01 n 5 Luffy refuses to back down from the hostile Sanji causing Sanji to confront him and attack him with Diable Jam be Despite Sanji's vicious attacks Luffy refuses to fight back or retreat and Nami pleads with Sanji to stop to no avail Finally Sanji knocks Luffy out with a spinning midair kick injuring him and returns to his family but not before Nami slaps Sanji in the face Enraged Luffy yells out to Sanji as he leaves saying that he will stay at this spot and not eat until Sanji returns as he cannot become the Pirate King without Sanji which causes him to break down in tears as he is taken to Big Mom
